scripts.sass-dev: sass --style=expanded assets/scss:assets/css && copyfiles -u 2 assets/css/theme.css ./ && copyfiles -u 2 assets/css/theme.css ./theme-dev-vault-main/.obsidian/themes
scripts.sass-prod: sass --no-source-map --style=expanded assets/scss:assets/css && copyfiles -u 2 assets/css/theme.css ./ && copyfiles -u 2 assets/css/theme.css ./theme-dev-vault-main/.obsidian/themes
